pageTitle: EZ Jack Ridge Crystal Pendant by Stone Lighting | PD043CRSNX2J
textBeforeTable: EZ Jack Ridge Crystal pendant features a glass diffuser in amber, clear or cognac. Finish available in bronze, polished nickel or satin nickel finish. One 20 watt, 12 volt JC G4 base Xenon lamp or one 35 watt 12 volt MR11 halogen bulb included. Also available in an LED version. General light distribution. ETL listed. 4.75 inch diameter x 3 inch height. EZ Jack Ridge Crystal Pendant REVIEWS BRAND TECHNICAL OPTIONS DESCRIPTION Shown in: Satin Nickel / Clear
textAfterTable: Dimensions: 3"H x 4.75"W Lamp Source: Krypton Xenon Bulb: 1 x T3/G4 (bipin)/20W/12V Krypton Xenon Bulb included Dimmer: Dimmable Download Specification Sheet  ETL About Stone Lighting Stone Lighting offerings range from exciting new crystal designs to Murano organic glass creations and are composed of innovative designs that have inspired our industry for many years. Stone Lighting’s latest portfolio of luminaires is sure to impress you. They have combined a flair for originality with creative and unique cutting edge designs. You will also find the best in low voltage lighting systems in our newest generation of monorail and cable lighting. Stone Lighting is also on the forefront of LED innovation, incorporating the energy efficient technology into many of its luminaires. The product selection from Stone Lighting ranges from Monorail Lighting to Bath Lighting to Exterior Lighting, creating a collection of fixtures for every room in your home.
